channel.title: Vmware on
channel.link:
/tags/vmware/Recent content in Vmware onHugo -- gohugo.ioSat, 21 Jan 2017 00:00:00 +0000
Fix vmware workstation 12 launch problem (on Arch...maybe others)/notes/fix-vmware-workstation-12-launch-error/Sat, 21 Jan 2017 00:00:00 +0000/notes/fix-vmware-workstation-12-launch-error/VMware workstation did not launch. I forget the error (or lack there of). sudo mv /usr/lib/vmware/lib/libz.so.1/libz.so.1 /usr/lib/vmware/lib/libz.so.1/libz.so.1.BAK sudo ln -s /usr/lib/libz.so.1 /usr/lib/vmware/lib/libz.so.1/libz.so.1
